question: Ricky has a magic money box. Every day the box doubles the number of coins placed inside of it. Ricky put in 3 pennies on Monday. He looked inside his box on Friday. How many pennies did Ricky see?
response:
On Monday, Ricky put 3 pennies in the magic money box.
On Tuesday, the number of pennies doubled, so there were 6 pennies in the box.
On Wednesday, the number of pennies doubled again, so there were 12 pennies in the box.
On Thursday, the number of pennies doubled once more, so there were 24 pennies in the box.
On Friday, the number of pennies doubled one last time, so there were 48 pennies in the box.

The answer is 48 pennies.
